[url=http://"http://www.veldahar.com/Veldahar%20Client.zip"][IMG]http://puu.sh/1VK21[/img][/url][B][FONT=courier new][SIZE=2] [/SIZE][/FONT][/B]

[UPDATE]January 25th, 2013: Npc disappearing glitch and reappearing It was thought out to be caused from fighting barrows monsters but the problem persisted throughout that tests lifetime. The glitch was apparent when an NPC was spawned specifically for a player with the same height level of the player. I soon later realized that the access to a players height level was static, for what reason i'm unsure. So I changed the access to public and the issue is no longer apparent. [/UPDATE] [UPDATE]January 26th, 2013: Item height level support: It had come to my attention that items dropped by either players or npcs could be pickup up and viewed on any heightlevel, meaning there was no height support. All I did was edit a few classes like ItemHandler, PickupItem and GroundItem and added the support.[/UPDATE]
[/CENTER]

[UPDATE]January 25th, 2013: Npc disappearing glitch and reappearing It was thought out to be caused from fighting barrows monsters but the problem persisted throughout that tests lifetime. The glitch was apparent when an NPC was spawned specifically for a player with the same height level of the player. I soon later realized that the access to a players height level was static, for what reason iâ€™m unsure. So I changed the access to public and the issue is no longer apparent. [/UPDATE]
[UPDATE]January 26th, 2013: Item height level support: It had come to my attention that items dropped by either players or npcs could be pickup up and viewed on any heightlevel, meaning there was no height support. All I did was edit a few classes like ItemHandler, PickupItem and GroundItem and added the support.[/UPDATE]

[/CENTER]
